column2: I enjoyed it here! Our waiter was friendly and attentive
column3: and our food was A1. We all had ordered the green eggs and decided to substitute the toast with biscuits instead
column4: and HOKAYY what a great choice that was! Those biscuits were just the cherry on top of a delicious meal. Eggs were cooked perfectly - not too runny or overcooked - while the potatoes were seasoned to my exact liking. The sausage was also an added delight so can't forget about that. Mimosa could've had a bit more champagne
column5: but I think that's just the alcoholic in me talking.
